strings.fieldReportFormTitleSelectLabel: Please check for, and link to an existing emergency if available
strings.fieldReportFormTitleSelectPlaceholder: Click here to link to an existing hazard alert (if one exists)
strings.fieldsStep1AssistanceDescription: Indicate if the government requested international assistance.
strings.fieldsStep1CountryDescriptionEW: Anticipated Affected Country and Province / Region
strings.fieldsStep1CountryLabelEW: Potentially Affected Country and Province / Region *
strings.fieldsStep1DisasterTypeDescription: If Covid-19 select “Epidemic” as the disaster type
strings.fieldsStep1NSAssistanceDescription: Indicate if the National Society requested international assistance.
strings.fieldsStep1StartDateDescriptionEPI: The date when the first case is confirmed.
strings.fieldsStep1StartDateDescriptionEVT: Start date is when some significant effects are felt or when the first significant impact is felt.
strings.fieldsStep1StartDateDescriptionEW: Date at which significant impacts are forecasted to occur.
strings.fieldsStep1SummaryDescription: The title is automatically populated based on your selection above with the date of this report. You may edit it with any required details. The report number will be automatically generated and added to the end of the title.
